ovdesc.p: This file is used to control the building of the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file.
This file provides the facility for several types of build which may be run on line or during the batch.
This job processes the movements across account or contracts and also populates the 'static' information such as customer number and currency of the account or contract.

The calculation of the average balances are is carried out by this job, and relies on the information provided by the population job to create accurate average balances. Although this job will run without the population job being run first, the information will not be as accurate as the latest movements will not be included on the average balances.
The refinancing rates are extracted by this job and applies the settings on the MI.PARAMETER record to determine which rate is applicable and any margins applicable to that rate.

It is possible to modify the dates used by the main jobs and hence perform rebuilds. The calculation date and population date will be set to the same date by the rebuild period, but the refinancing date may be set to a different date.
